data.title: OpenText
data.meta_description: HP is now part of OpenText
data.text:
In May 2016, OpenText™ acquired certain customer experience software and services assets from HP Inc. (NYSE: HPQ). The software assets acquired include: TeamSite, a modern multi-channel digital experience management platform for web content management; MediaBin, a digital asset management solution; Qfiniti, an intelligent workforce optimization solution designed to improve enterprise contact center management; and, Explore and Optimost.

In August 2016, OpenText also acquired the Customer Communications Management (CCM) assets from HP Inc. (NYSE: HPQ), including: Exstream, Output Management, TeleForm and LiquidOffice for customer communications management, process automation, and document delivery solutions. These assets allowed OpenText to better serve its customers by offering a wider set of CCM capabilities in areas including: authoring, workflow, and composition for multichannel document presentment and interactive communications.

These solutions are now part of the overall Experience Cloud strategy and offer a set of applications and add-on products that focus on delivering personalized content and engaging interactions along a continuous customer journey.

Rebranded product names

Former name Rebranded name TeamSite OpenText™ TeamSite™ MediaBin OpenText™ MediaBin Optimost OpenText™ Optimost Qfiniti OpenText™ Qfiniti Explore OpenText™ Explore Exstream OpenText™ Exstream™ Output Server OpenText™ Output Server TeleForm OpenText™ TeleForm LiquidOffice OpenText™ LiquidOffice

Partners

Partners can visit the Partner portal in OpenText™ My Support for more information on products, programs and enablement. Login is required. Register at https://login.opentext.com/ or contact partners@opentext.com for assistance.
